myProducts.title: My Products
myProducts.subtitle: Manage your product memberships
myProducts.empty: You don't belong to any product yet.

leave.title: Leave Product
leave.description: Are you sure you want to leave {{name}}?
leave.warning: You will lose access to all data in this product.
leave.lastAdminError: You cannot leave as you are the last admin of this product.

title: Products
subtitle: Products in {{org}}
empty: No products yet. Create your first product to get started.
noOrgSelected: Select an organization to view products.
notFound: Product not found or you don't have access.
createDescription: Create a new product to organize your marketing efforts.

form.name: Product name
form.slugHint: URL-friendly identifier. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

stepDescriptions.details: Set the product identity used across the workspace and for URLs.
stepDescriptions.basics: Anchor the baseline with the core promise and current stage.
stepDescriptions.market: Clarify who the product serves and where it competes.
stepDescriptions.strategy: Capture the strategic intent that guides decisions.
stepDescriptions.personas: Define the people we write for and how to speak to them.

helpers.name: Use the product name your team recognizes internally.
helpers.slug: Used in URLs and integrations. Keep it short and stable.
helpers.valueProposition: Summarize the core outcome users get from the product.
helpers.problemSolved: Describe the recurring pain this product removes.
helpers.productType: Clarify how the product is delivered to users.
helpers.businessModel: Tell the system how revenue or value is captured.
helpers.stage: Sets expectations for maturity and rollout cadence.
helpers.targetMarket: Identify the primary buying or usage context.
helpers.industries: Select the industries that best describe your market.
helpers.audiences: Choose the main audiences who consume product updates.
helpers.productVision: Optional north star to steer narrative and positioning.
helpers.strategicPillars: Highlight the priorities this product must reinforce.
helpers.metricsOfInterest: Pick the outcomes the product should influence.
helpers.personasIntro: Optional, but helps tailor tone and content decisions.
helpers.personaRole: State the persona's role so context uses the right lens.
helpers.personaGoals: What this persona wants to achieve with the product.
helpers.personaPainPoints: What frustrates or blocks this persona today.
helpers.personaPreferredTone: Tone guidance for messaging to this persona.

delete.title: Delete Product
delete.consequences: This will permanently delete the product and remove all members. All associated data will be lost.

members.title: Product Team
members.subtitle: Manage who can access {{name}}
members.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the product?

settings.title: Product Settings
settings.name: Name
settings.releaseCadenceHelp: Used by agents to choose how far back to interpret activity.

baseline.title: Product Baseline
baseline.description: Define the canonical information the AI must respect when generating context.

errors.personaIncomplete: Complete all fields for this persona or remove it.

placeholders.valueProposition: Example: Turn real product progress into clear, reusable updates for marketing and CS.
placeholders.problemSolved: Example: Teams struggle to communicate product progress consistently across tools.
placeholders.productVision: Example: Become the narrative layer connecting product development with every team.

strategicPillarsDescriptions.productExcellence: Build a solid, reliable product with strong technical and UX quality.
strategicPillarsDescriptions.userAdoptionRetention: Help users adopt quickly and use the product repeatedly.
strategicPillarsDescriptions.growthAcquisition: Increase visibility, users, and pipeline through acquisition and distribution.
strategicPillarsDescriptions.narrativeBrand: Communicate clearly what the product is, why it matters, and how it differs.
strategicPillarsDescriptions.operationalEfficiency: Improve operational efficiency and team alignment by reducing manual work.
strategicPillarsDescriptions.scalabilityImpact: Ensure product and business can scale sustainably with economic impact.

personaPains.noTime: Lack of time to document progress

context.sectionDescription: Generate and review the AI-enriched context for this product.
context.baselineDescription: Provide the canonical information the AI must respect when generating context.
context.title: Context summary
context.subtitleEmpty: Generate the initial context using your sources and baseline.
context.surfaceSignalsSubtitle: Identify which sources feed each product surface.
context.debugPromptHelp: Store the prompt + instructions in the raw JSON for troubleshooting.
context.valuePropositionHelp: Elevator pitch or main promise for the product.
context.productCategoryHelp: High-level product category (e.g., CRM, Analytics, Platform).
context.productTypeHelp: Delivery type (web app, mobile, API, platform…).
context.businessModelHelp: How you monetize (SaaS, marketplace, usage, on-prem).
context.stageHelp: Current maturity (idea, MVP, beta, production, scale-up).
context.personasHelp: Primary user personas to anchor tone and priorities.
context.platformsHelp: Channels where the product exists (web, iOS, Android…).
context.technicalStackHelp: Core technologies used by the product.
context.languagePreferenceHelp: Preferred language to generate the context.
context.toneGuidelinesHelp: Preferred communication tone for the product.

domainDescriptions.coreExperience: Primary user-facing flows that deliver the core product value.
domainDescriptions.dataIngestion: Connect, sync, and ingest signals from external sources.
domainDescriptions.automationAi: Automate interpretation and AI-driven processing of product signals.
domainDescriptions.analyticsReporting: Measure outcomes, usage, and reporting tied to product activity.
domainDescriptions.contentDistribution: Publish, template, and distribute product narratives and assets.
domainDescriptions.collaborationAccess: Teams, roles, access control, and shared workspaces.
domainDescriptions.platformFoundation: Security, billing, reliability, infrastructure, and platform services.
domainDescriptions.internalTools: Internal tooling and admin workflows that support operations.
domainDescriptions.marketingPresence: Marketing site, brand surface, and acquisition pages.
domainDescriptions.documentationSupport: Docs, guides, onboarding, and support materials.

context.taxonomyEmpty: Run the taxonomy to see a summary.
context.taxonomyInvalid: Feature map output is invalid JSON.
context.determinismEmpty: Run the determinism check to see a summary.
context.noSources: No external sources connected yet. Connect a source (e.g. GitHub) to enrich the context.

products.title: Products
products.subtitle: Manage products in {{name}}
products.empty: No products yet. Create your first product to get started.
